text: Carolina Machado de Oliveira (born November 29, 1994) is a Brazilian actress. Oliveira was nominated for an International Emmy Award, considered the Oscar of the TV world, for best actress in Hoje É Dia de Maria. Oliviera was born in São José dos Campos, São Paulo, Brazil. She is known for the TV series "Caminho das Índias" (India: A Love Story) (2009), "Hoje é Dia de Maria" (Today is Maria's Day) (2005), and "Páginas da Vida" (Pages of Life) (2006). == References == == Other websites == * Category:Living people Category:1994 births Category:Actors from São Paulo Category:People from São José dos Campos
title: Carolina Oliveira
